sql: SELECT `books`.`id`, `books`.`authors_id`, `books`.`languages_id`, `books`.`title`, `books`.`year`, `books`.`created_at`, `books`.`updated_at`, `author`.`id` AS `author.id`, `author`.`name` AS `author.name`, `author`.`created_at` AS `author.created_at`, `author`.`updated_at` AS `author.updated_at` FROM `books` AS `books` INNER JOIN `authors` AS `author` ON `books`.`authors_id` = `author`.`id` LIMIT 1
